page.title: 10THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND
page.content: David Mumford became Priest-in-Charge of St.Mary's,Therfield and St.Faith's, Kelshall in 1983.Whilst a great deal of time is taken up in administrative duties of the parish,priority is given to visiting people in their homes ,to get to know them and to and form ongoing relationships. The usual community provides an envirroment for building bridges towards the acknowledgement of God's Kingdom through the workings of His Holy Spirit,in creating the feeling of the family of God within our village.The main focus of worship has been on the Eucharist. Now Children's church,house and prayer groups are included to extend the promotion of the Gospel of Jesus Christ.Churchwardens lead an active Church Council. Many parishioners give their time freely in maintaining the church & churchyard.
